sentences.en: After trudging for some distance, his slow steady steps acted as a soporific.
sentences.cn: 及至走出来一些路,脚步是那么平匀, 缓慢,他渐渐的仿佛困倦起来.

sentences.en: His voice had an almost soporific effect.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音几乎有催眠作用。

sentences.en: His voice had an soporific effect.
sentences.cn: 他的声音具有催眠作用.

sentences.en: I dozed off during the soporific music.
sentences.cn: 我听到这催人入睡的音乐,便不知不觉打起盹儿来了.

sentences.en: I found his style of lecturing soporific.
sentences.cn: 我感到他的讲课方式令人昏昏欲睡.

sentences.en: I often have to take soporific before I go to bed.
sentences.cn: 我常在睡前不得不服安眠药.

sentences.en: In Lavengro (or is it Romany Rye?) there is an impossible character, a victim of insomnia, who finds that a volume of Wordsworth's poems is the only sure soporific; but that was Borrow s malice.
sentences.cn: 在《拉文格罗》（或者是《吉卜赛男人》）一书中有一个无可救药的人，患有失眠症，他发现华尔华斯的一卷诗集是惟一有效的催眠剂，但那只不过是伯罗的恶作剧而已。

sentences.en: Providence out of pity for mankind, has instilled a soporific charm into all tedious things.
sentences.cn: 老天爷悲悯世人, 他在一切沉闷的东西上都施加了催眠般的魔力.

sentences.en: The soporific is ready! What a nasty smell! I can fill the washbowl now.
sentences.cn: 安眠药准备好了! 多难闻的气味! 我可以把它放在脸盆里.

sentences.en: The warmth of the room and the monotony of the speaker's voice grew soporific.
sentences.cn: 房间里的热气和发言人单调的声音让人昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: They certainly had soporific effect upon the Flopsy Bunnies!
sentences.cn: 它们确实对佛洛普西家的小兔们有很强的催眠效果.
这种药物具有良好的催眠效果.

trans.tran_en: making you feel ready to sleep
